#summary Trascendental functions

= libtrig.txt =

Library for fixed point trigonometry

= WORDS =

{{{
::cos 	| bangle -- sin

::sin 	| bangle -- sin

::sincos | bangle -- sin cos

::xy+polar | x y bangle r -- x y

::ar>xy | xc yc bangle r -- xc yc x y

::atan2 | x y -- bangle

::distfast | dx dy -- dis

::sqrt | n -- sqrt
}}}
